questions.q: In the $ season PLAYER threw % strikes out of # pitches what was his percentage of strikes he threw?
In the $ season PLAYER had % strikeouts while facing # batters. What percentage of batters did he strike out?
In the $ season PLAYER gave up % home runs and faced # batters. What percentage of batters hit home runs off of him?
In the $ season PLAYER had % wins and # losses. What was his win/loss percentage?
In the $ season PLAYER had % home runs and # hits. What percentage of the hits were home runs?
In the $ season PLAYER had % strikeouts in his # at bats, what was his strikeout percentage?
In the $ season PLAYER had % rbi and # hits. What percentage of hits resulted in an rbi?
In the $ season PLAYER had % runs and # at bats. What percentage of at bats resulted in a run?
In $, the TEAM had % runs and # hits, what percentage of hits resulted in a run.
In $ the TEAM had % hits and # at bats. What percentage of at bats resulted in a hit.
In $ the TEAM had % runs and # total bases. What percentage of those bases resulted in a run?
In $, the TEAM had % strike outs and # at bats. What percentage of at bats resulted in a strike out?
